question: "Which tree produces red fruits called ""haws""?"
vanilla_rag_result: Several species of hawthorn produce red fruits called "haws." Specifically, Crataegus sanguinea (redhaw hawthorn or Siberian hawthorn) and Crataegus pinnatifida (Chinese hawthorn) are mentioned in the passages as having red fruits. Additionally, Crataegus maximowiczii also produces red to purple-black fruits.
